citation.title: New empirical model for the structural properties of silicon
citation.abstract: An empirical interatomic potential for covalent systems is proposed, incorporating bond order in an intuitive way. The potential has the form of a Morse pair potential, but with the bond-strength parameter depending upon local environment. A model for Si accurately describes bonding and geometry for may structures, including highly rebonded surfaces.

notes.text: This is Tersoff's Si(A) potential, which used a slightly different functional form than the commonly known "Tersoff" potential form. It failed to predict diamond cubic as the ground state structure.
